title: BEP20 Token Contract
description: Create an BEP20 Token with liquidity and tax fee on binance smart chain network in less than a minute with our full audited smart contract solidity code, 100% token ownership.

title: ERC20 Token Contract

description: Create an ERC20 Token with liquidity and tax fee on polygon network in less than a minute with our full audited smart contract solidity code, 100% token ownership.

title: Buy and Burn Contract
description: This smart contract is designed to create a deflationary mechanism for the token, reducing the overall supply over time and potentially increasing its value for investors.

title: BNB Divider Contract
description: The BNB Divider smart contract is a decentralized application (DApp) built on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) that facilitates the division and distribution of BNB tokens among multiple participants.
